item.title: Second periscope.tv
item.description: 16:34 Wednesday 08 July 2015 JST Hmm! Soness texted me after I texted her HI! Hi! On periscope in 1 min. Join or chat later ok? Xoxo Wait what? What’s periscope? Probably some autocorrect mistake. I looked it up cause I couldn’t think of what she might have meant otherwise, and, well, periscope is Periscope, an app with which we can “broadcast” live video from our mobile devices.
